templates.name: SUPPORT
templates.content:
The best way to continue help with this request is to text "SUPPORT" and you will be directed to another team member. Please do not send images via text as we cannot view them. In these cases, you may email us directly using customerservice@shop.igloocoolers.com or give us a call at 1-800-273-7024. 

Please note that our team is available Monday - Friday 8:00am - 5:00pm PST.

templates.name: 90 QT Cooler Recall
templates.content:
We want to inform you that we have issued a recall for the 90 QT Cooler. If you purchased this product, please visit the following link for details on the recall and next steps:
https://igloo90qtrecall.expertinquiry.com/?lang=en

- If you're based in the US or Canada, call us toll free at 888-943-5182, from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. ET Monday through Friday or by email at igloo90qt@sedgwick.com.
- If you're based in Mexico, call us toll free at 800-0408540, from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. CST Monday through Friday or by email at igloo90qt@sedgwick.com.

templates.name: Can I use coolers to keep hot drinks/hot food as well?
templates.content: Yes, our coolers can be used to keep hot things hot as well!

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at 1-800-273-7024 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/igloocoolers/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/igloocoolers/

templates.name: What is the difference in the Trailmate journey and marine?
templates.content: Trailmate marine has stainless steel accessories, anti-skid tires, and a back handle, whereas the journey doesn't have these upgrades.

templates.name: Donation requests
templates.content: For donations, please email us at donations@igloocorp.com and someone from our team will be glad to assist you further.

templates.name: Do you price match?
templates.content: Unfortunately, we don't offer price matching at the moment.

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at customerservice@shop.igloocoolers.com. Our team is happy to chat!

templates.name: Are your cooler bags BPA free?
templates.content: BPA-free is the requirement basically for the plastic components and the PEVA liner on soft side cooler bags, so the PEVA liner and plastic components on our IGLOO cooler bags are BPA-free.

templates.name: How do I track my order?
templates.content: You can track your order from here: https://www.igloocoolers.com/apps/wonderment/tracking?search

templates.name: Wholesale Inquiries
templates.content:
You can find more information about wholesale pricing and becoming an authorized retailer here: https://www.igloocoolers.com/pages/become-an-igloo-retailer

For other wholesale inquiries, please email us directly at sales_dept@igloocorp.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: What are your shipping rates?
templates.content: Our shipping rate for orders under 2 lbs is $5.99, between 2 lbs-14.99 lbs would be $9.99, between 15 lbs-34.99 lbs is $15.99, and for 35 lbs and more it's $19.99.

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.igloocoolers.com/pages/shipping-and-return-policy

templates.name: Do you ship to Hawaii and Alaska?
templates.content: Unfortunately we don't offer shipping to Hawaii and Alaska at this time, but we're working to expand our shipping area in the near future. Stay tuned!

templates.name: Military/nurse/first responder discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't specifically have discounts for that, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!

templates.name: Where are your items made / manufactured?
templates.content: Our tumblers are made in China and many of our coolers are as well, although some are manufactured here in the USA since 1947 and we're happy to call Katy, Texas our home.

templates.name: Are images printed on your tumblers and growlers?
templates.content: The tumbler and growlers are printed on, no stickers, but the playmates are decals.

templates.name: Where do orders ship from?
templates.content: Good question! Orders are processed and shipped out of our Katy, Texas facility Monday - Friday 9am to 5pm (CT). We ship to the contiguous US only. Hope this helps!

templates.name: Do you ship to PO boxes?
templates.content: Apologies for the inconvenience, but we don't ship to P.O boxes.

templates.name: How do I keep things in my cooler cold for longer?
templates.content: We have some tips to make sure that your cooler stays cold longer; 1. Prechill your contents ahead of time. You can also prechill your cooler overnight prior to packing. You can keep it cold during use by filling it with large ice cubes, and use dry ice for maximum ice retention, but use it with caution.

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $100. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?

templates.name: Warranty Policy
templates.content: We build coolers and cooler accessories to help you do the things you love with the people you love. Whether you're using it for work or for play, we want you to be satisfied with your product, and we guarantee the craftsmanship of everything we make. If your Igloo product fails due to defects in material or workmanship and falls within the guidelines of the Warranty policy, you may submit a claim here: https://www.igloocoolers.com/pages/warranty-form-submission You can also check out our warranty policy here: https://www.igloocoolers.com/pages/warranty-service

templates.name: Can I change my shipping address?
templates.content: I'm afraid we're unable to change the shipping address once the order has been placed. My sincere apologies and I greatly appreciate your understanding about this matter.

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: Thank you for sharing this information! For these types of requests, please email customerservice@shop.igloocoolers.com and attach any relevant photos. Our customer support team there will be able to best assist you. Please note that our team is available Monday - Friday 8:00am - 5:00pm PST.

templates.name: Apply code retroactively
templates.content:
The best way to continue help with this request is to text "SUPPORT" and you will be directed to another team member. Please do not send images via text as we cannot view them. In these cases, you may email us directly using customerservice@shop.igloocoolers.com or give us a call at 1-800-273-7024. 

Please note that our team is available Monday - Friday 8:00am - 5:00pm PST.

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content:
The best way to continue help with this request is to text "SUPPORT" and you will be directed to another team member. Please do not send images via text as we cannot view them. In these cases, you may email us directly using customerservice@shop.igloocoolers.com or give us a call at 1-800-273-7024. 

Please note that our team is available Monday - Friday 8:00am - 5:00pm PST.

templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://www.igloocoolers.com/collections/sale

templates.name: Are you hiring?
templates.content: Igloo: Thanks for your interest! You can check out this link to see our available positions: https://igloo.attn.tv/aHMIaRI0F9HG Hope this helps. Let me know if you have further questions.

templates.name: Are there image size recommendations?
templates.content:
Each product has designated customization areas:

• Playmate Cooler - Front/Back: 10.05" x 5.13" or 724 x 369 px
• Playmate Cooler - Sides: 9.14" x 7.51" or 658 x 369 px
• 32oz Tumbler: 2.25" x 3"

Please note that you can scale and reposition your image in the customization tool.

templates.name: Can I cancel my custom order?
templates.content: Customized products are final sale and cannot be canceled or changed once the order is placed.

templates.name: Can I get a Corporate Sales Quote for customized items?
templates.content: If you're looking for a large order, contact us via our Contact Us page: https://www.igloocoolers.com/pages/contact-us We'd love to help you create something amazing.

templates.name: What’s formal monogramming?
templates.content: Formal monogramming means your last name initial goes in the middle - but when entering your initials, type them in the order of first, middle, last. We're working on making this even easier for you - stay tuned!

templates.name: What’s the maximum file size I can upload for customization?
templates.content: You can upload files up to 10 MB. That's plenty of room to bring your coolest ideas to life!

templates.name: Why was my customized order canceled?
templates.content: If an order contains prohibited content, such as copyrighted material, hate speech, or offensive language, it may be canceled. If this happens, we'll refund your order within 5-7 business days.

templates.name: What happens if my image gets rejected?
templates.content: You may see a message like: "Oops... let's try again - The image you've uploaded contains small text that may not translate well during the engraving process." This means your image didn't meet our content or quality guidelines. Please try uploading a clearer, more legible design.

templates.name: How long will it take to receive my customized order?
templates.content: Customization takes a little extra time, but it's worth the wait! Expect about 5 to 7 days from the time you place your order to when it ships out. We'll keep you posted every step of the way!

templates.name: What content is not allowed?
templates.content:
Please do not upload:

• Offensive, obscene, or explicit content
• Content that promotes hatred, discrimination, or violence
• Copyrighted or trademarked material that you do not own
• Text that is too small to be legible

Before uploading, you must agree to the following: "I understand that my upload may be rejected, or my order cancelled if Igloo determines or reasonably suspects I may have violated these terms."

templates.name: Is there a warranty for customized products?
templates.content: Yes - customized items are covered by our standard product warranty. You can view the full warranty policy here: https://www.igloocoolers.com/pages/warranty-service

templates.name: Will I receive tracking information for my customized order?
templates.content: Yes! Tracking numbers will be emailed to you once your payment is processed and your order has shipped.

templates.name: What kind of files can I upload?
templates.content: You can upload the following file types: PNG, JPG, JPEG, TIFF, TIF, BMP, EPS, and PDF. Please note that the maximum file size is 10 MB.

templates.name: Can I return or exchange a customized product?
templates.content: Because every customized product is made just for you, we're unable to accept returns or exchanges. Please triple-check your design before you click "order".

templates.name: Can I edit my custom order after placing it?
templates.content: Once your custom order is submitted, it's officially in production, so we're not able to make edits. Please double-check everything (especially spelling!) before completing your purchase.

templates.name: Can I customize Igloo products with my own text or images?
templates.content: Yes! You can personalize select Igloo coolers and drinkware using your own custom text or uploaded images.

templates.name: Is there a spell check when I add custom text?
templates.content: There is no built-in spell check in the customization tool. However, your web browser may offer spelling suggestions.

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content:
On average, order processing can take 24-48 hours,  and we usually ship via FedEx. Once shipped, it will take 3-6 business days for domestic orders. 
Customization takes a little extra time, but it's worth the wait! Expect about 5 to 7 days from the time you place your order to when it ships out. 
Keep in mind, we don't offer expedited shipping right now.

templates.name: Start/Initiate a Return
templates.content: You'll be able to start your return here: https://igloocoolers.happyreturns.com

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: You can take a look at our trusted retail partners at the following link: https://www.igloocoolers.com/pages/authorized-retailers Our Igloo Company Store is located in Brookshire, Texas and you can check out our working hours here: https://www.igloocoolers.com/pages/igloo-company-store
